name: The Temple of the King
desc:
One day, in the <input type="text" value="" data-result="year" /> of the fox 
Came a time remembered , 
When the strong <input type="text" value="" data-result="young" /> man of the rising sun 
Heard the tolling of the great black <input type="text" value="" data-result="bell" />. 
One day in the year of the fox, 
When the bell began to <input type="text" value="" data-result="ring" />, 
It meant the <input type="text" value="" data-result="time" /> had come for one to go 
To the temple of the king. 

There in the middle of the <input type="text" value="" data-result="circle" /> he stands, 
Searching, seeking. 
With just one touch of his trembling <input type="text" value="" data-result="hand" />, 
The answer will be found. 
Daylight <input type="text" value="" data-result="waits" /> while the old man sings, 
Heaven help me! 
And then like the rush of a thousand wings, 
It <input type="text" value="" data-result="shines" /> upon the one. 
And the day has <input type="text" value="" data-result="just" /> begun. 

One day in the <input type="text" value="" data-result="year" /> of the fox 
Came a time remembered <input type="text" value="" data-result="well" />, 
When the strong <input type="text" value="" data-result="young" /> man of the rising sun 
Heard the tolling of the great black <input type="text" value="" data-result="bell" />. 
One day in the year of the fox, 
When the bell began to <input type="text" value="" data-result="sing" />
It meant the <input type="text" value="" data-result="time" /> had come for the one to go 
To the temple of the king. 

There in the middle of the <input type="text" value="" data-result="people" /> he stands, 
Seeing, feeling. 
With just a wave of the strong right <input type="text" value="" data-result="hand" />, he's gone 
To the temple of the king. 

Far from the circle, at the edge of the <input type="text" value="" data-result="world" />, 
He's hoping, wondering. 
Thinking back on the <input type="text" value="" data-result="stories" /> he's heard of 
What he's going to see. 
There, in the middle of a <input type="text" value="" data-result="circle" /> it lies. 
Heaven help me! 
Then all could see by the shine in his <input type="text" value="" data-result="eyes" />
The <input type="text" value="" data-result="answer" /> had been found. 

Back with the people in the <input type="text" value="" data-result="circle" /> he stands, 
Giving, feeling. 
With just one touch of a strong right <input type="text" value="" data-result="hand" />, they know 
Of the temple and the king.
